author: Nigel Slater
programme: Nigel Slater's Dish of the Day
method: Preheat the grill. Grind the cumin and coriander seeds with the garam masala in a mortar and pestle and add the oil. Thinly slice the courgettes and mix with the spice oil. Place the courgettes in a pan with the tomatoes and cook for 6-8 minutes. Toast the pitta bread under the grill. Fill the pittas with the courgettes and tomatoes and squeeze down to release the tomato juice.
ingredients: 1 tbsp cumin seeds,  1 tbsp coriander seed,  1 tbsp garam masala,  3 tbsp groundnut oil ,  1 courgette,  300g/10Â½oz cherry tomatoes,  2 pitta breads
